mapper.select: SELECT ad.address_mapping_id, ad.address_type_code, ad.platform_type_code, ad.address_mapping_ex_code, ad.address_mapping_ex_name, ad.is_active, ad.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, c.region_id, c.region_code, c.region_name, c.parent_region_id FROM o2md_region c LEFT JOIN o2md_address_mapping ad ON ad.region_id = c.region_id WHERE 1=1 AND c.region_id = #{id} AND ad.platform_type_code=#{type}

SELECT ad.address_mapping_id, ad.address_type_code, ad.platform_type_code, ad.address_mapping_ex_code, ad.address_mapping_ex_name, ad.is_active, ad.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, c.region_id, c.region_code, c.region_name, c.parent_region_id FROM o2md_region c LEFT JOIN o2md_address_mapping ad ON ad.region_id = c.region_id WHERE 1=1 AND c.region_code = #{regionCode} AND ad.platform_type_code=#{platformTypeCode}
